label: 興福寺略年代記
本: Five Mountains: The Rinzai Zen Monastic Institution in Medieval Japan . Harvard University Press . 1981
見出し読み: こうふくじ りゃく ねんだいき
説明文: The Kofukuji ryaku nendaiki was compiled into its current form in 1725 by the monk Shoen, abbot of the noble cloister Daijoin within Kofukuji, who appears to have recorded the section dating after 1576. The earlier parts are extrapolated from various sources, dating to the thirteenth and fourteenth centuries.
